Class AbstractGenericRepository<T,ID>

java.lang.Object
com.university.persistance.repositories.AbstractGenericRepository<T,ID>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the entity
ID - the type of the entity's identifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGenericRepository<T,ID>
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayerRepository, RunHistoryRepository
public abstract class AbstractGenericRepository<T,ID> extends Object implements IGenericRepository<T,ID>
A generic repository for performing common database operations.
